name: SUB MORTIS
description:
This is a very short, one room prototype I created to demonstrate some of the physics interaction and smartphone UI I'm currently experimenting with for a larger project. It's unpolished and bugs will likely pop up. If you have any feedback please leave a comment, thanks!


  • Grid inventory system
  • Interactive smart phone
  • Physics-based interaction ala Penumbra/Amnesia
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • TAB - Phone
  • F - Phone Light
  • Left Click - Interact (Hold to drag)/Take Picture (Camera)/Scan (Camera)
  • Right Click - Throw Held Object/Examine Object
  • Scrollwheel Up - Next Hotkey Item/Zoom In (Camera)
  • Scrollwheel Down - Previous Hotkey Item/Zoom Out (Camera)
  • Q - Phone Home Screen
  • 1-9 - Select Hotkey Item
